title: Newsgroups no longer working
content:
I started having problems with newsgroups sometime after updating to TB version 102. I'm not really sure exactly when.

I started noticing that when I check for new messages, only about 1/2 of them are getting downloaded.

This even happens for messages from the same poster. I may get some of their messages downloaded and some not downloaded.

This happens from 3 different news servers, eternal-september, paganini bofh, and solani so the problem doesn't seem to be on their end.

I installed XanaNews 1.21 awhile back and using it I get all messages including those that are not downloaded by TB.

I just upgraded to TB 102.11.2 when it came out and I am still having the same problem.

Any help appreciated.

Thanks, Bill
creator: billh98033

title: Thunderbird Beta Rss
content:
Hello everyone, I just installed Thunderbird Beta (114.0b6 - 64 bit) out of curiosity.

When I import RSS Feed, all icons representing folders are gone unlike on Thunderbird Stable version.

Although Feed Subscription pop up window still show icon for each feed folder.

Is this normal on Thunderbird Beta?
creator: kirie.miku

title: Thunderbird update - lost all my local subfolders
content: Windows 11 - Thunderbird update today - lost all my local subfolders - How can I restore them or roll back this update.
creator: Grouchy1
